DOC.detailed_description: One hundred one patient schedule undergo invasive dental surgery ( i.e. , dental implant ) participate experiment . After dental surgery , patient prescribe once-daily analgesic regimen 7 day . The intervention consist label manipulation . Patients randomly assign either brand-name analgesic ( purportedly ) cheap generic version . In reality , participant obtain brand-name medication . The medication provide cost , patient instruct take first pill clinic . They inform could ( ) increase dosage prescribe analgesic twice daily necessary ( b ) stop take medication longer need . Any change regimen discourage , patient instruct consult dentist change . Telephone follow-ups conduct 24 hour , 4 day , 7 day surgery . Two main dependent variable obtain : number prescribe analgesic consume number non-prescribed analgesic consume . The patient also report pain felt period .
